resources.string: Adjust the icon size does not work well in some case, you could remove the settings by select remove settings.
"Configure dpi warning: Some applications and themes does not work well if the dpi is set as 268. DO NOT report it as bug, just set back to 320 if you are not happy."
Configure the layout, and there are known issues for widget under 5 columns.
This application is portet from the note2 and is not officially supported by MIUI, it is only used for test purpose. (by fanoge@miui)
A reboot is required for some cases
